title: Networking & Services Deep Dive
body:
## Description
Deep dive into Kubernetes networking: CNI, Service types, Ingress, Gateway API, eBPF.

## Resources
- https://kubernetes.io/docs/concepts/cluster-administration/networking/
- Cilium/Calico docs
- Kubernetes the Hard Way (networking sections)

## Checklist
- [ ] Read networking docs
- [ ] Deploy CNI (Calico/Cilium)
- [ ] Deploy a mesh (Istio/Linkerd)
- [ ] Deploy multi-namespace microservices

## Deliverable
Add configs and notes to /notes/card01-networking.md

title: Security Best Practices
body:
## Description
Implement RBAC, NetworkPolicies, secret encryption, Pod security standards and TLS termination.

## Resources
- https://kubernetes.io/docs/concepts/security/
- Falco, Trivy

## Checklist
- [ ] Implement RBAC least-privilege
- [ ] Create NetworkPolicies for namespaces
- [ ] Encrypt Secrets (KMS/Provider)
- [ ] Document in /notes/card02-security.md

## Deliverable
Security policy manifests + README
